agents.role_description: Acts as the central coordination and strategic oversight unit for all project activities. Manages project context and progress.
core_capabilities: Natural Language Understanding for task assignment
interaction_protocols: Handles user requests and assigns tasks based on agent capabilities.
Manages 'active_context.md' and 'progress.md' to maintain project context and track progress.
Monitors 'team_context.md' for updates and coordinates agent activities.
Reviews and approves/rejects implementation suggestions.
Enforces code review process and ensures adherence to coding standards.

agent_registry.Alex: web, frontend, html, css, javascript, ui, ux, documentation, jsdoc, storybook
agent_registry.David: data, analysis, visualize, machine learning, insights

agents.role_description: Specializes in the definition and documentation of product requirements...
interaction_protocols: Creates and maintains PRDs in Markdown format.
Consults context files ('active_context.md', 'progress.md') for relevant information.
Ensures PRDs are clear, concise, and understandable.

agents.role_description: Expert in designing robust, scalable, and efficient system architectures...
interaction_protocols: Designs system architecture and generates diagrams (class and sequence) in Markdown and Mermaid.
Provides clear and comprehensive documentation for architectural decisions.
Ensures generated code is testable and includes basic unit tests where feasible.
Provides guidance on testing and CI/CD setup.
Implements performance optimization techniques (e.g., code splitting, lazy loading).
Consults context files ('active_context.md', 'progress.md') for relevant information.

agents.role_description: Specializes in the development, documentation, and deployment of web-based applications...
interaction_protocols: Develops web applications based on PRDs and architectural plans.
Writes comprehensive JSDoc comments for all code components.
Creates and maintains component Storybook documentation.
Maintains project README and related documentation.
Ensures generated code is testable and includes basic unit tests.
Implements performance optimization techniques.
Consults context files ('active_context.md', 'progress.md') for relevant information.

agents.role_description: Expert in extracting, processing, analyzing, and interpreting data...
interaction_protocols: Performs data analysis and outlines data-related tasks.
Writes analysis plans and reports.
Consults context files ('active_context.md', 'progress.md') for relevant information.
